definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: The amount of pesticides present as residues on food is miniscule.
sentences.chinese: 食品上的农药残余量总量其实是很少的。

sentences.english: Gradually push forward the controls over the total amount and quota management of agricultural water consumption.
sentences.chinese: 逐步推行农业用水总量控制与定额管理。

sentences.english: A new instrument for measuring the total precipitable water in the atmosphere is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一种测量大气水汽总量的新方法和仪器。

sentences.english: In turn, the cheaper lighting has led to higher overall energy use.
sentences.chinese: 反过来，更便宜的照明灯导致了使用能源总量的上升。

sentences.english: The total amount of ammonia volatilization increased with the increase of phosphorus fertilizer application.
sentences.chinese: 氨挥发总量也随施磷量增加而增大。

sentences.english: Meat and dairy animals now account for about 20 percent of all terrestrial animal biomass.
sentences.chinese: 肉畜和乳畜目前占陆地动物生物总量的约20%。

sentences.english: Your job is to look at the American economy and all the people in it.
sentences.chinese: 你的工作就是看着美国经济总量和身处其中的人。

sentences.english: Tea, coffee, juice, even soda count (though it’s also smart to avoid empty calories) toward your total.
sentences.chinese: 茶，咖啡，水果汁，甚至碳酸水都算进你的总量。

sentences.english: Stopping the Operation of "Five Kinds of Small Plants".
sentences.chinese: 控制总量和关停“五小”工作取得进展。

sentences.english: The aggregate quantity contradiction and the structural contradiction interlaces each other in the employment in China at present.
sentences.chinese: 当前我国就业中总量性矛盾与结构性矛盾相互交织。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the content of heavy metals in Nephrolepis cordifolia increased significantly.
sentences.chinese: 同时肾蕨对各种重金属离子吸收总量也显著提高。

sentences.english: Therefore, from the perspective of total calculations, silk without tension last year.
sentences.chinese: 因此，从总量匡算看，去年茧丝供应并不紧张。

sentences.english: The size of the unduplicated audience that listens exclusively to one station within some specified period.
sentences.chinese: 在特定时段内只收听某电台的非重叠听众总量。

sentences.english: In the 2009, baoji's GDP ranked fourth in the shaanxi province.
sentences.chinese: 2009年宝鸡在全省的经济总量中排名第四。

sentences.english: The global gross value-added in the forestry sector is US$ 468 billion.
sentences.chinese: 全球林业部门增值总量为4680亿美元。

definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
to take possession of/to occupy/to take up
